thread.title: People reveal their most pathetic attempts at crafts
thread.title_full: People reveal their most pathetic attempts at crafts | Daily Mail Online

author: Sophie Inge For Mailonline
title: People reveal their most pathetic attempts at crafts
text:
Whether it's knitting or jewellery-making, we all like to unleash our creative selves every now and then.
After all, why shell out a fortune on the high street for something that you can make yourself?
But if these photos are anything to go by, there are some crafts which are better not tried at home.
People have been sharing their pathetic attempts at artistry on the idea-sharing website Bored Panda - with hilarious results.
Crayon art - where the sticks are melted for artistic effect - proved particularly tricky, with several wannabe artists posting photos of their disastrous attempts
Crayon art - where the sticks are melted for artistic effect - proves particularly tricky, with several people posting photos of their disastrous attempts.
Candle-making is another craft best left to the experts as one wannabe artist found out when they accidentally set fire to their candle made from orange peel.
In other hilarious fail, a crocheted bird met with an untimely death, after failing to stand up straight on its perch.
As for attempting 'lace eggs' with a drill - you might as well just give up.
This aspiring candle maker failed to take into account that orange peel might be flammable and risked burning the house down in their attempt to be artistic
This ambitious craftsman attempted to make lace eggs using a drill, but ended up with shattered shells
Sometimes, it pays to make a trip to the salon rather than attempting elaborate nail art yourself
The rustic charm of these leaf adorned candle jars was somewhat lost in the execution
Wrapping string around a balloon to create a decorative pendulum is a lot harder than it sounds
This wooly hat doesn't look as if it's going to keep the wearer's head especially warm
This snow globe looks more like something out of a horror movie than a festive gift
This woman was aiming for leopard print eyelids and ended up looking somewhat diseased
It seems these substandard crocheted birds couldn't take it any longer as they dangled from their perches
Soap-making is probably best left to the experts as this wannabe artist discovered
This impatient craftsman appears to have thrown out the instructions, after forgetting to put a sheet of parchment paper between the beads and the iron
This artist failed to appreciate the craftsmanship that goes into carving a stag's head and gave up early
This woman should probably have used a mirror when attempting this fancy do
Unfortunately this person's attempt at jewellery making didn't result in the kind of accessory you'd be proud to be seen wearing
This woman should probably aim a little lower with her make-up routine
